On this website, there are interactive s.en: On this website, there are interactive stories.
On this website, there are interactive s.fr: Sur ce site, il y a des histoires interactives.
On this website, there are interactive s.de: Auf dieser Website gibt es interaktive Geschichten.
On this website, there are interactive s.pl: Na tej stronie znajdziesz interaktywne historie.
On this website, there are interactive s.sv: På den här webbplatsen finns det interaktiva berättelser.
On this website, there are interactive s.nl: Op deze website staan interactieve verhalen.
On this website, there are interactive s.es: En este sitio web hay historias interactivas.
On this website, there are interactive s.ua: На цьому сайті є інтерактивні історії.
On this website, there are interactive s.ar: في هذا الموقع, ستجد بعض القصص التفاعلية.

Choose a story that is easy for you..en: Choose a story that is easy for you.
Choose a story that is easy for you..fr: Choisis une histoire qui est facile pour toi.
Choose a story that is easy for you..de: Wähle eine Geschichte aus, die für dich einfach ist.
Choose a story that is easy for you..pl: Wybierz historię, która jest dla ciebie łatwa.
Choose a story that is easy for you..sv: Välj en berättelse som är på en lagom lätt nivå för dig.
Choose a story that is easy for you..pt: Escolhe uma história que é fácil para ti.
Choose a story that is easy for you..nl: Kies een verhaal dat voor jou makkelijk is.
Choose a story that is easy for you..es: Elige una historia que sea fácil para ti.
Choose a story that is easy for you..ua: Обирай історію, яка тобі під силу.

You may not understand all the words..en: You may not understand all the words.
You may not understand all the words..fr: Tu ne comprendras peut-être pas tous les mots.
You may not understand all the words..de: Es kann sein, dass du nicht jedes Wort verstehst.
You may not understand all the words..sv: Du kanske inte förstår precis alla ord.
You may not understand all the words..pt: Podes não entender todas as palavras.
You may not understand all the words..nl: Je begrijpt misschien niet alle woorden.
You may not understand all the words..es: Es posible que no entiendas todas las palabras.
You may not understand all the words..ua: Можливо, ти не зрозумієш усіх слів.
You may not understand all the words..ar: ربما لا تستطع فهم كل الكلمات.

Listen to each sentence several times if.en: Listen to each sentence several times if you want.
Listen to each sentence several times if.fr: Écoute chaque phrase plusieurs fois si tu veux.
Listen to each sentence several times if.de: Hör dir jeden Satz mehrmals an, wenn du willst.
Listen to each sentence several times if.pl: Jeśli chcesz, wysłuchaj każdego zdania kilka razy.
Listen to each sentence several times if.sv: Lyssna på varje mening flera gånger, om du vill.
Listen to each sentence several times if.pt: Ouve cada frase várias vezes se quiseres
Listen to each sentence several times if.nl: Luister meerdere keren naar elke zin als je wil.
Listen to each sentence several times if.es: Escucha cada oración varias veces si quieres.
Listen to each sentence several times if.ua: Слухай кожне речення кілька разів, якщо хочеш.
Listen to each sentence several times if.ar: اسمع كل جملة أي عدد من المرات تريده.

You may recognize some words..sv: Du kanske känner igen några av orden.

Click on a sentence to see its translati.en: Click on a sentence to see its translation.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.fr: Clique sur une phrase pour voir sa traduction.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.de: Klicke auf einen Satz, um seine Übersetzung zu sehen.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.pl: Kliknij na zdanie, aby zobaczyć jego tłumaczenie.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.sv: Klicka på en mening för att se dess översättning.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.pt: Clica numa frase para ver a sua tradução.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.nl: Klik op een zin om de vertaling te zien.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.es: Haz clic en una oración para ver su traducción.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.ua: Клікай на речення, щоб побачити його переклад.
Click on a sentence to see its translati.ar: انقر على كل جملة لتري ترجمتها.

It will help you follow the story..en: It will help you follow the story.
It will help you follow the story..de: Das hilft dir, der Geschichte zu folgen.
It will help you follow the story..sv: Det hjälper dig att följa berättelsen.
It will help you follow the story..pt: Isso vai ajudar-te a acompanhar a história.
It will help you follow the story..nl: Dit zal je helpen om het verhaal te volgen.
It will help you follow the story..es: Te ayudará a seguir la historia.
It will help you follow the story..ua: Це допоможе тобі стежити за розвитком подій.

It will help you understand..sv: Det kommer att hjälpa dig att förstå.
It will help you understand..nl: Dit zal je helpen om het verhaal te begrijpen.
It will help you understand..ar: و بالتالي هذا سيساعدك على الفهم.

You can now choose a story..en: You can now choose a story.
You can now choose a story..fr: Tu peux maintenant choisir une histoire.
You can now choose a story..de: Du kannst jetzt eine Geschichte auswählen.
You can now choose a story..sv: Du kan nu välja en berättelse.
You can now choose a story..nl: Je kan nu een verhaal kiezen.
